details:
verb
- cause to be born
= synonyms: bear
- deliver (a speech, oration, or idea)
= synonyms: present
- utter an exclamation or noise of some sort
= example: utter an exclamation or noise of some sort
- pass down
= synonyms: return
- bring to a destination, make a delivery
= example: bring to a destination, make a delivery
- throw or hurl from the mound to the batter, as in baseball
= example: throw or hurl from the mound to the batter, as in baseball
= synonyms: pitch
- relinquish possession or control over
= synonyms: surrender
- to surrender someone or something to another
= example: to surrender someone or something to another
= synonyms: render
- carry out or perform
= example: carry out or perform
= synonyms: drive home
- hand over to the authorities of another country
= synonyms: deport, extradite
- free from harm or evil
= synonyms: rescue
- save from sins
= synonyms: save
